screens.title: Parameters: Empty Boxes in Your Recipe üì¶
screens.analogy: Parameters are like empty boxes in your recipe. When you write the recipe (function), you leave boxes for ingredients. When you actually cook (call the function), you fill those boxes with real ingredients (arguments).
screens.tip: Parameters receive values when you call the function. The values you pass are called arguments.
